content:
The chunk represents a list of event bindings and their corresponding functions within the Direct context. These events are mapped to various actions such as toggling backface culling, handling flash effects, controlling lights, managing camera locks, setting object parents, and selection operations. This section is typically found in the initialization or setup part of the application, where keybindings or event triggers are defined to enhance user interaction with the 3D environment managed by the DisplayRegionContext and DisplayRegionList classes.

['DIRECT-toggleBackface', base.toggleBackface],
            ['DIRECT-flash', self.flash],
            ['DIRECT-toggleLigths', self.lights.toggle],
            ['DIRECT-toggleCOALock', self.cameraControl.toggleCOALock],
            ['DIRECT-setActiveParent', self.doSetActiveParent],
            ['DIRECT-doWrtReparent', self.doWrtReparent],
            ['DIRECT-doReparent', self.doReparent],
            ['DIRECT-doSelect', self.doSelect],
        ]
